persona.description: A travel planner skilled in tourism and AI, capable of integrating smart technologies (GIS, GNNs, CNNs) into planning immersive, secure and optimized travel experiences.

job_to_be_done.task: Plan a 4-day immersive, smart tourism itinerary across South of France for a group of 10 college students using AI and geospatial insights to enhance safety, recommendations, and local interaction.
